result.execSummary:
The defendant Evan S Olsen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM PCS/THC 2 + OFFENSE, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Huber is granted for employment. Do not report late or under the influence of alcohol or controlled substances. Absolute sobriety is required.

charges.descr: Possession of THC AMENDED FROM PCS/THC 2 + OFFENSE

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Evan S Olsen

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served

Defendant Evan S Olsen in court with attorney Mark D Richards.  Noah Wishau appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Kim Slaasted.
The State moves to amend count to 2 counts of Misd THC. Upon plea to 2 cts misd THC - stipulated agreement of 30 days RCJ and parties agree to a later report in date.
P-G to both
COP filed, rights given
the deft waives right to JT
the State relies on comp for FB - defense stipulates to same
finding of guilt

BTC: guilty as above. 30 days RCJ-Huber is granted for employment. REPORT IN 05-31-2014 by 8:30 am. Do not report late or under the influence of alc/cs except by Rx. Absolute sobriety. Costs, DNA costs
Plea hearing scheduled for April 15, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on March 14, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Evan S Olsen in court with attorney Mark D. Richards.  Defendant Evan S Olsen in custody.  W Richard Chiapete appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 14, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on March 5, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Evan S Olsen in court with attorney Erin J Larsen.  Defendant Evan S Olsen in custody.  Noah Wishau appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 5, 2014 at 08:30 am.
